definition: in American football, the position of a player on a football team who is stationed on the line of scrimmage
details:
noun
- in American football, the position of a player on a football team who is stationed on the line of scrimmage
= example: in American football, the position of a player on a football team who is stationed on the line of scrimmage
- a person who installs or repairs electrical or telephone lines
= synonyms: electrician, linesman
- one of the players on the line of scrimmage
- the surveyor who marks positions with a range pole
